p: In addition to structural requirements for optimal NS3-4A inhibition, our data showed that three MPPs: CoPP, ZnPP and SnPP, were equally active against four of the major viral genotype enzyme constructs, ie 1A, 1B, 2A, and 3A, ( Table 3). The weaker inhibitory activity of mesoporphyrins was also noted across these genotypes. The effectiveness of the MPPs against genotype 3A protease is especially attractive as it is the most resistant of all genotypes to first and most second-generation oral anti-proteases 10 suggesting consideration for use as a pan-genotypic agent.
